mapper.insert: insert into tb_order(create_time, desk_num, order_type, remarks, status) values(NOW(), #{deskNum}, #{orderType}, #{remarks}, 0)
mapper.select: select id, create_time, desk_num, order_type, remarks, status from tb_order where status = 0 or status = 3 order by id desc
select id, create_time, desk_num, order_type, remarks, status from tb_order where status in (1,2,4) order by id desc limit #{begin}, #{end}
select count(1) from tb_order where status in (1,2,4)
